title: Windows 10, xbox recoding feature
body:
Hey guys, I want to know how to record using this new feature. I put LoL on windows/boarder less mode but when i press "windows g". My hotkey for pinging turns on and the recording soft ware doesn't work.

Is there a way to record the whole screen instead of just a program or something to make me able to record just LoL?, the world needs to see my Shaco plays XD

replies.body:
Maybe i didn't explain this clearly. What happens is when im in game and press my "windows button" and the letter "g" on my keyboard the panel doesn't show up. So i tried to the "windows button" "alt" and "r" at the same time, (which will start recording on normal things" but again it didn't work.
How do i make it record LoL
Just install OBS and use that instead. You'll get better quality video with less of a performance impact if you configure it properly.

are you using a keyboard that disables the windows key like a razer blackwidow or something?

also, make sure the game bar appears.
